name: Pin Brick Ball Breaker
description:
Okay so a while back, I decided to crossbreed pinball and brick breaker. This was probably a genius idea which someone else has almost certainly done before because I couldn't be bothered to check. The thing is that I'm kinda sick of it? Like this project has turned into a real drag. So I'm just letting it go. It's mostly done but not quite, and definitely still has a few bugs which I honestly cannot be bothered to fix.

But if brick breaker but controlled like it's pinball sounds fun to you, you're welcome to enjoy 20 levels and an infinite randomly generated arcade mode. Have fun!
